item.title: ATT&CK v16 - October 2024
item.description: The following issues are known discrepancies and non-compliance within the current ATT&CK knowledge base.
item.content:encoded: The following issues are known discrepancies and non-compliance within the current ATT&CK knowledge base. These issues reflect elements that do not conform to the Zod schemas and require changes to bring the knowledge base into full compliance. Your understanding and patience are appreciated as we work to make improvements.
